summary: The Academy Award for Original Score is given to the best body of music in the form of dramatic underscoring that is written specifically for a movie.
full_text: Alex North  was an American composer best known for his many film scores, including A Streetcar Named Desire , Viva Zapata!, Spartacus, Cleopatra, and Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?. He was the first composer to receive an Honorary Academy Award.
title: Alex North
